name: cuttle
description: The deepest card game under the sea

scripts.e2e:client: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider ENABLE_VUE_DEVTOOLS=true npx cypress run --config-file tests/cypress.config.js
scripts.e2e:gui: cross-env ENABLE_VUE_DEVTOOLS=true npx cypress open --config-file tests/cypress.config.js
scripts.e2e:mockprod: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider CUTTLE_ENV=production npm run e2e:server
scripts.e2e:server: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider VUE_APP_API_URL=http://localhost:1337 npx cypress run --config-file tests/cypress.config.js
scripts.e2e:server:gui: cross-env VUE_APP_API_URL=http://localhost:1337 npx cypress open --config-file tests/cypress.config.js
